doctor.name: Dr. Md. Habibur Rahman Tarek
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Habibur Rahman Tarek is a Hematologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, DCP (Clinical Pathology), FCPS (Hematology). He is a Associate Professor, Hematology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Habibur Rahman Tarek at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 4pm to 5:30pm (Everyday).
